item.title: Building an AWS Troubleshooting Guide Generator with Amazon AgentCore
item.description:
Why I built this

Troubleshooting AWS issues often means jumping between documentation, blog posts, and tribal knowledge. Even experienced engineers end up repeating the same diagnostic steps across services.

I wanted to explore whether Amazon AgentCore could be used to:

  • reason about AWS problems step by step
  • invoke the right tools at the right time
  • produce clear, structured troubleshooting guides

So I built a working prototype to test this idea end-to-end.
